house_listing.house_description: This single family home has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dining/LivingCombo, Dishwasher, Kitchen Island, Library, Loft, Microwave, Pantry
